mapper.insert: insert into sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR (PKID, CASE_CODE, SRV_CODE,SRV_CAT PROCESSOR_ID, ORG_ID,CREATE_TIME,UPDATE_TIME,CREATE_BY,UPDATE_BY) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srvCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srvCat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},GETDATE(),GETDATE(),@{SESSION_USER_ID},@{SESSION_USER_ID})

PKID,

GETDATE(),GETDATE(),@{SESSION_USER_ID},@{SESSION_USER_ID},
mapper.update:
update sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR
CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRV_CODE = #{srvCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRV_CAT = #{srvCat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESSOR_ID = #{processorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME=GETDATE(),UPDATE_BY=@{SESSION_USER_ID},
where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR
SRV_CODE = #{srvCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRV_CAT = #{srvCat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESSOR_ID = #{processorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME=GETDATE(),UPDATE_BY=@{SESSION_USER_ID},
where CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PROCESSOR_ID =#{preProcessorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR set CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRV_CODE = #{srvCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRV_CAT = #{srvCat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESSOR_ID = #{processorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME=GETDATE(),UPDATE_BY=@{SESSION_USER_ID} where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select distinct CASE_CODE AS caseCode from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where PROCESSOR_ID = #{processorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SRV_CODE AS srvCode from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select distinct SRV_CAT AS srvCat from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by srvCat
SELECT FROM sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE=#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (PROCESSOR_ID !=#{processorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or PROCESSOR_ID is null)
SELECT PROCESSOR_ID, ORG_ID FROM sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where case_code=#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and srv_code=#{srvCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE=#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and SRV_CODE in('3000401001','3000401002','3000400201','3000400101')
